CmdLine: apk update && apk add --no-cache         nginx       && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*       && chmod +x /s6/nginx-service/run /s6/nginx-service/finish       && chown root /s6/nginx-service/run /s6/nginx-service/finish       && mkdir -p /run/nginx && touch /run/nginx/nginx.pid       && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run
